Existing syntax:

```
const selectOptions = [
  { value: 'a', label: 'Option A' },
  { value: 'b', label: 'Option B' },
  { value: 'c1', label: 'Option C-1', group: 'Option group C' },
  { value: 'c2', label: 'Option C-2', group: 'Option group C' },
];
```

Alternative nested syntax:

```
const selectOptions = [
  { value: 'a', label: 'Option A' },
  { value: 'b', label: 'Option B' },
  {
    value: [
      { value: 'c1', label: 'Option C-1' },
      { value: 'c2', label: 'Option C-2' },
    ]
    label: 'Option group C'
  },
];
```
